rows.label: tev027001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Felice about the Nopon Bazaar.

rows.label: tev027001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Felice if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Felice what it was like during the attack.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0051
rows.name:
Ask Felice what the Nopon were doing during the
attack.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Felice about the Nopon caravan.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Felice where Chiroro is.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Felice if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Felice about the Nopon.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Felice about recent developments.

rows.label: tev027001_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Felice about recent developments.

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0001
rows.name:
It looks like the rare items on sale here are brought in
by Nopon from across Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0002
rows.name:
The accessories on display were so cool that I walked
right into their trap. When shopping is this fun,
you know there has to be a catch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0003
rows.name:
They're such smooth little talkers that you end up
buying all kinds of junk you don't need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you need to haggle with them, definitely remember to
keep your wits about you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oh my god, this is mortifying. I just got through
telling Dana she needs to "find a way to shine" if she
wants to reel in this guy she likes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0011
rows.name:
And now look whose head is sparkling brighter than
a freshly waxed floor. My head! Dana is gonna have
a field day with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0012
rows.name:
I can hear her already: "Oh, wow. That is one shiny
noggin, chrome dome! Don't go blinding any Skell
pilots with that!" Ugh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0013
rows.name:
I need to find a wig before she has a chance to give
me any crap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0014
rows.name:
That Chiroro character is gonna get it for selling
me that snake oil![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0020
rows.name:
Luckily, NLA runs evacuation drills, so we knew exactly
what to do in an emergency.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0021
rows.name: We were able to get to safety with minimal casualties.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0022
rows.name:
A lot of that was because the Nopon hadn't moved in
yet. I shudder to think how things would've gone down
if THEY were around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0023
rows.name:
They probably would've freaked out and disrupted the
entire evacuation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0024
rows.name:
Then, right when we were at our most frazzled,
they would have aggressively tried to sell us pepper
spray or home security cameras or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0030
rows.name:
Are you kidding? The bazaar was probably the
liveliest place around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0031
rows.name:
The second they caught wind we were under attack,
the Nopon immediately broke out a stash of food
rations and emergency survival products.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0032
rows.name:
They played us like a bunch of terrified little fiddles.
I could've sworn I heard one of them literally shout,
"Buy this crap if want to live!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0033
rows.name:
Well, I must be a total sucker, 'cause even I caved and
bought myself a "bomb-proof hood."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0034
rows.name:
Then again, it DID prevent everyone in the shelter from
seeing what happened to my hair, so I guess that still
counts as self-defense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0040
rows.name:
Did you notice the Nopon have a caravan in
Cauldros? As in, where the Ganglion base is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0041
rows.name:
I told Chiroro to step up her game, but I never
imagined she'd send her people into that death trap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0042
rows.name:
The Nopon are a lot of things, but those cute little
swindlers are definitely not cowards.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0043
rows.name:
I guess when the smell of rare and lucrative
merchandise comes wafting over, "life and limb" take
a solid second place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0048
rows.name:
The merchants at the Nopon bazaar said they spotted
Chiroro in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0049
rows.name:
Don't tell me she went someplace as dangerous as that
just to find me some hair-growth medicine...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0050
rows.name: Because that would legitimately make me feel bad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0055
rows.name:
Oh my god, this is mortifying. I just got through
telling Dana she needs to "find a way to shine" if she
wants to reel in this guy she likes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0056
rows.name:
And now look whose head is sparkling brighter than
a freshly waxed floor. My head! Dana is gonna have
a field day with this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0057
rows.name:
I can hear her already: "Oh, wow. That is one shiny
noggin, chrome dome! Don't go blinding any Skell
pilots with that!" Ugh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG0058
rows.name:
I need to find a wig before she has a chance to give
me any crap.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1001
rows.name:
Those little fellas make the slog all the way from
Noctilum in the west to Cauldros in the north,
and they do it over and over again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1002
rows.name:
In the process, they manage to find stuff rare enough to
make the most accomplished Curator giggle in delight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1003
rows.name:
Those guys are some seriously hardcore merchants.
Not just Chiroroâ€”all of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1004
rows.name:
Sometimes I think we still have a few things to learn
from the locals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1010
rows.name:
Oh! Guess what! When I was at work, Victoria told me
she likes my hair the way it is! Or isn't or...whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1011
rows.name:
I respect her fashion opinion more than anyone else
in the city, so to hear her say that pretty much made
my existence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1012
rows.name:
Seriously, I feel like a brand-new woman now.
I'm ready to work my butt off and make NLA's fashion
scene really shine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1017
rows.name:
I had lunch with Dana for the first time in a while the
other day, and you won't believe this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1018
rows.name:
She was wearing an eyeball! This girl was actually
wearing a real indigen EYEBALL necklace.
That is just so...wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1019
rows.name:
After she was done trying to explain why it was "hip,"
I made her take it off and gave her something less...
anatomical to wear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1020
rows.name: Crisis averted. Thank you, fashion intervention![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev027001_MSG1021
rows.name:
I mean geez! I know her heart's in the right place,
but a third eye isn't going to help her nab a boyfriend.[ST:wait ]
